Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

Malice:
 
For a moment, Malice did nothing.  Then he let out a sigh, and the energy sphere disappeared.  The wire loosened it's hold on Blacknightmare and wound back into his wrist.  He picked up the femme and brought her over to Hellplague and he sat down with Blacknightmare still in his arms.

airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
BlackNightMare::

"STOP!!! I COMMAND YOU!!!"shouted the femme


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, robert riley <bustercross365@y...> 
wrote:
> Malice:
>  
> With Blacknightmare bound, Malice drained some of her power, and 
pulled her closer as he walked toward her.  He powered up, and knelt 
down next to her.  He placed his hand in front of her chest, and a 
sphere of energy formed in his palm.
> "Good night, Master."
